name: The Blue Katana
description:
The Blue Katana is a challenging, fast-paced action game. With over 60+ levels in the 3 part campaign. Master the art of The Blue Katana and exterminate all remaining life.

Combat Loop:

  1. Assess your surroundings
  2. Assess your arsenal 
  3. KILL EVERYTHING 

Features:

  1. 60+ Levels packed to the brim with enemies! 
  2. 3 Difficulties to challenge yourself with! 
  3. Speedrun mode to display true mastery of the combat 

Music By:

KTTXDOG

Made By:

Objectively Big Games
